title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Find information for an approach
description:
For those who watched my video you probably have seen I am using STAR's (Standard Terminal Arrival Route) pretty regularly. From several of my subscribers I got the question how I select the correct  STAR's
In this how to I will show you how you can find more information about for Standard Terminal Arrival Route (STAR's). 

Site used in this video:
https://opennav.com/
